cab.content: ThU113 B:eni js Majesty'fh^ property of(P 2432) From Secretary of State to Viceroy, Foreign Department,Sth April 1920.Priority A.Your telegram 290 S.f dated 12th March received 26th March. Afghanistan. Proposed instructions to your representatives are generally approved. I will await further communication from you in regard to points raised in latter part of your telegram.
